metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13135 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A NULL Pointer Dereference exists in VideoLAN x265, as used in libbpg 0.9.7 and other products, because the CUData::initialize function in common/cudata.cpp mishandles memory-allocation failure. It was discovered that VideoLAN x265 mishandled certain memory-allocation failures. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service (crash)

criterions.comment: x265 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6-3').
